query:
SELECT r.id, r.customerId, r.amount, r.paymentMethod, r.status, r.transactionId, r.endToEndId, r.createdAt, c.name, c.pin 
FROM recharges r 
LEFT JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id 
WHERE r.id = 600001 OR r.transactionId = 'f76786d04e5d44508fd50305c8a062ee'
LIMIT 5;
command:
